algorithm_technique: Track counts of each croak character, ensuring sequential order and that no frog starts a new croak without finishing the previous one.
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum number of frogs needed to produce a given sequence of croaks.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a frequency array to track active croaks, ensuring sequential character completion and valid frog usage.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by tracking the counts of each character in the 'croak' sequence.
A frog can only start a new 'croak' if it has completed the previous one.
The maximum number of active 'croak' sequences at any point determines the minimum number of frogs required.
